title: 108_s2030
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the nonrefundable income tax credit for employment-related dependent care expenses and replace it with a refundable 50 percent income tax credit, reduced as the taxpayer's adjusted gross income exceeds $15,000 . Limits the dollar amount of such credit to $3,000 . Includes within the scope of the new credit up to $1,200 of respite care expenses incurred for the taxpayer's spouse and dependents who are physically or mentally incapable of self-care.
